definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: It is a large leather suit case with my name tag. It'; s dark blue.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個膳縵沔繫有我名牌的大型皮製黑藍色行李箱。

sentences.english: It is also nice to is too probably the flavor of breakfast jollification.
sentences.chinese: 也許是早膳的味道太熱鬧太好。

sentences.english: It is also good to is too probably the savor of breakfast jollification.
sentences.chinese: 也許是早膳的味道太熱鬧太好。

sentences.english: But he hanged the chief baker: as Joseph had interpreted to them.
sentences.chinese: 法老卻把膳長掛起來，正如約瑟給他們的解釋一樣。

sentences.english: 22 but he hanged the chief baker, just as Joseph had said to them in his interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 但把膳長掛起來，正如約瑟向他們所解的話。

sentences.english: So the guard took away their choice food and the wine they were to drink and gave them vegetables instead.
sentences.chinese: 於是委辦撤去派他們用的膳，飲的酒，給他們素菜喫。

sentences.english: Thus Melzar took away the portion of their meat, and the wine that they should drink; and gave them pulse.
sentences.chinese: 於是委辦撤去派他們用的膳，飲的酒，給他們素菜喫。

sentences.english: They boarded her for $100 a month.
sentences.chinese: 他們每月收費100美元爲她供膳。

definition: tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
to make oneself presentable/to freshen up
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
food and drink/food to accompany wine
warm room/warm partition of a room
